mapper.select: select * from Energy where (id=(select MAX(id) from Energy))
select * from Energy where (date >=#{date1} and date <= #{date2})
mapper.insert: insert into Energy( name, standardsWater, water, standardsElectricity, electricity, standardsGas, gas) values (#{name},#{water},#{standardsElectricity},#{electricity},#{standardsGas},#{gas})
mapper.update: update Energy set(name=#{name}, standardsWater=#{standardsWater}, water=#{water}, standardsElectricity=#{standardsElectricity}, electricity=#{electricity},standardsGas=#{standardsGas}, gas=#{gas}) where (id=#{id})
